subject: Shipping #SSN4544
description_text:
Dear Simsonn Team,
​I am writing regarding my order #SSN4544. In a previous email, I received
information that I would be issued a refund for the shipping costs of this
order.
​Could you please let me know when I can expect to receive the refund and
via which payment method it will be processed?
​Thank you in advance for your help.
​Best regards

conversations.body_text: Hi Kamil Adamowski,    We sincerely apologize that the pedals are currently sold out at our German warehouse. We will ship them to you via DHL after restocking this week and refund the additional shipping charges.

Dear Simsonn Team,

Thank you for your quick response. Could you please let me know the
approximate date when the pedals will be back in stock and when I can
expect the shipment?

If the waiting time will be longer than a few days, is it possible to
cancel the order?

Thank you in advance for your information.

Best regards,
Kamil Adamowski

Hi Kamil Adamowski,    We sincerely apologise for any inconvenience caused. Our German warehouse is currently out of stock. We will arrange an urgent shipment via UPS, with delivery expected on the 22nd. We will refund the shipping costs once the product has been delivered.

Hello,

I am contacting you regarding my order #SSN4544

When I was placing the order, the information on the website indicated that
the item would be shipped from the *EU warehouse (Germany)*. However, I can
see from the tracking information that the package is actually being
shipped from *China*.

As you know, shipping from Germany to Poland does not involve any
additional customs duties or VAT. Now that the package is coming from China
and its value exceeds €150, I will be charged *23% Import VAT* and customs
clearance fees by the courier in Poland (approximately 60-70 USD extra).

Since I chose the EU shipping specifically to avoid these additional costs,
could you please clarify this situation? Will you reimburse me for the VAT
and customs fees I will have to pay upon delivery?

I look forward to your prompt response.

Best regards,
Kamil Adamowski

śr., 17 gru 2025, 04:36 użytkownik service@simsonn.com

Hello,

I would like to inform you that the package has been delivered successfully.

As previously discussed, I paid an additional fee for expedited shipping.
Due to the delay in dispatch, you informed me that the shipping cost would
be refunded once the package was delivered.

Could you please confirm when and how the refund of the shipping cost will
be processed?

Additionally, I would like to ask about customs duties and related fees.
Are these costs refunded or covered by your company in any way, or are they
fully the customer’s responsibility?

Thank you in advance for your clarification.

Best regards,
Kamil Adamowski
